alertDescription.value: the number of replicas is less than desired

query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_statefulset_status_replicas') | extend statefulset = tostring(Labels.statefulset) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend StatusReplicas=Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_statefulset_replicas') | extend statefulset = tostring(Labels.statefulset) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend Replicas = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, statefulset, namespace | where StatusReplicas < Replicas | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, StatusReplicas, Replicas, statefulset, namespace
